topics.name: Socializing Dogs, Off Leash Dog Recreation,

results.description: This is a group for people that love dogs and want to make new friends. When I go to the dog park with my pup, I find myself bonding with other like-minded individuals. We love our pups. We love going out to get drinks/dinner. We have busy lives during the day but still want to socialize and make new friends. Let's all get together for weekly walks, drinks, chats, etc. It's a dog walking social group. :-)
results.name: Jersey City Dog Lovers Meetup

topics.name: South Asian Expat Indian Desi Bollywood Punjabi

results.description: Let's meet up for weekend fun activities - family picnics, evening dinner pot-lucks, Bollywood movies, old-style desi drinks and dance parties, a nice chitchat, or anything that is rejoicing enough to not miss home. We just moved from India (Gurgaon) to the north-central Jersey area and are looking to connect with like-minded people and make new friends. Completely open group, everyone is invited to join and invite others to join!
results.name: North Central Jersey Indians Social Meetups

topics.name: Traveling with new friends to new destinations

results.description:
Fabulous Traveling Girlfriends, is an AWESOME and diverse Travel Group for women in their 20's, 30's and 40's, who plan age specific trips, including those Fabulously Over Fifty Traveling Girlfriends. We will travel together and meet other like-minded women on their travels. Fabulous Traveling Girlfriends promotes a local community of members in NY by encouraging member participation by hosting and attending fun, local events, hosted by our amazing Leadership Team.

We are real women, serious about travel. YOU should be too.
We don't collect Meetup groups. We collect Friendships....Memories....Passport Stamps!

If YOU are a "Down to Earth", Independent Traveler who is self sufficient, able to go with the flow, enjoys Culture, Food, Wine (Spirits), Nature, Music and has an incurable thirst for exploring and having FUN, then you'll fit with this group just fine. Join us, and get ready to explore!
results.name: Fabulous Traveling Girlfriends of New York 20's, 30's, 40's

results.description:
This is a meetup group dedicated to exploring and discussing the powers of the human mind in all shapes and forms.From accelerated learning/reading to remote viewing, from exploring the  Singularity to Noontropics and brain enhancers.Our objective is reproducibility of results. If someone is special lets find out the difference that makes the difference so we can do it ourselves.

Speakers will share their projects with the members.One night be in in remote viewing, another in the next generation of brain enhancers, the next will be on accelerated learning. The objective  here is open the mind to new vistas and possibilites, Our emphasis is on learning tools that we can go out and use. If someone knows how to it we can find out why

This group is for explorers, aeronauts of the spirit. the curious and the open minded. Consensus reality is depressing and chaotic . We know there is a way out of the Matrix and we are here the find out.

So join us !!!
results.name: Human Potential Technologies

topics.name: Nordic Pole Walking - Enhance your lifestyle!

results.description:
This Central Park group is for anyone interested in trying out this new, innovative and non-invasive fitness and exercising methods of Nordic walking ( not to be confused with Hiking, other locations possible ). Already greatly accepted in Europe its booming in USA as well.  Simple yet very effective techniques with 46% more muscles activated then in regular walking, Nordic walking is an amazingly sufficient to get in shape, keep in shape and if needed, lose some weight. Connect with the nature and feel immediate results. Rain, snow or shine for even better natural feel. All levels welcome, as the point of this exercises is to do your own best. The meetups will end with soothing and simple Qigong, new exercises with Smovey will be shown as well. We will share our nutrition habits also where we will all learn from each other about some amazing powers of natural foods.  

Feel free to google all the benefits of Nordic walking, Qigong and Smovey and hope you will be introduced to a life long activity.

Regards,

Domo

www.domosports.com; facebook - nordicwalkingLI;

cell: (516)-499-0102


ps.  We can include other activities such as shooting hoops, soccer juggling, tennis, throwing fresbe, playing catch or even pool billiards, darts and ping pong but lets see how this goes first!
results.name: NYC Nordic Walking/Qigong/Smovey Meetup

results.description:
This group is for classical chamber musicians who would like to play with other musicians in weekly sessions with the guidance of professional coaches. The program is run by Alaria Chamber Ensemble, a well-known ensemble that has been in existence for 33 years and performs regularly at Bargemusic and at Weill Hall. Yuri Vodovoz, violinist and music director of Alaria, creates well matched chamber groups and duo-sonata classes. All instruments and all levels are welcome. Classes meet for two hour sessions, once a week, on Mondays and Wednesdays.

This meetup has several purposes:  to assist musicians to meet others  and play with a variety of other musicians;  to give musicians a chance to learn new music and hone their skills;  to meet and make new musical friends;  and to gives musicians a chance to challenge themselves while working with others.

The semester will include a master class by Mark Peskanov, Director of Bargemusic.

The Fall Session will run from Sept. 14 to December 15. There will be an open audition on Monday, Aug. 31, at 7 pm, at 244 West 54th Street, 10th Floor. Attendance at the audition creates no obligation to join the class, but gives you an opportunity to hear other students, to present a sample of your work and to decide if this class is a good match for you. Please contact Yuri Vodovoz at 917 860-7727 if you plan to attend the audition, if you would like to make alternate arrangements for an audition, or if you would like addition information about the class.

Tuition for the class is $800.
results.name: New York Chamber Music Classes

results.description: DEVersity NYC DEVersity NYC DEVersity NYC DEVersity NYC DEVersity NYC DEVersity NYC
results.name: DEVersity NYC

results.description: This meetup is for people who recently moved to NYC and want to make new friends and discover what the city has to offer.
results.name: New to NYC!!

results.description: This is a group for anyone looking to get fitter and leaner. Experience INSANITY LIVE at Stepping Out Studios! A total body, no equipment needed workout, based on the principle of MAX INTERVAL TRAINING. You work for intervals of 3 minutes with 30 seconds rest periods between sets. The classes will extend from 30 minutes to 45 minutes upon your fitness improvement. The format is as follows: DYNAMIC WARM UP, PLYOMETRIC & SPEED BLOCK, STRENGTH; STABILITY BLOCK, AGILITY & COORDINATION BLOCK, ABS & CORE BLOCK and a COOLDOWN & STRETCH BLOCK. Come and join us for this fun, challenging and fat shredding class!!!! Every Friday 8.30 pm!! The September 18th class is FREE!!!
results.name: Manhattan's Body Weight Fitness Classes-INSANITY WORKOUT

results.description: Square dancing is lots of fun and great exercise for all ages. Come join us! OPEN HOUSE Wednesday, September 30th 2015 at 7pm. Everyone is welcome...singles, couples, beginners and experienced dancers who love to dance. Live caller and great music! Every week we dance Mainstream and Plus (with workshops) and once a month we host a dance.
results.name: Al "e" Mo Square Dancers

results.description:
Bed Stuy is our home, and with friends to explore an even better home! This group will help to connect Bed Stuy women with the purpose of creating friendships, networks, and most of all memories. 

Please note: this group is for women. If you are not a woman, you will be asked to leave. Sorry guys!
results.name: Bed Stuy Ladies in the Know!

results.description: We're offering our 10 week introductory course for just a $10 admin fee. Classes start the week of September 14. True wisdom is priceless, precious and practical. It has the power to set people free from the fears and anxieties that hold them back. Philosophy Works - our 10 session course in practical philosophy, is based on the proven wisdom of East and West. Lively and interactive, the classes offer practical tools for experiencing greater freedom and happiness, inviting you to test the words of the wise in daily life. http:www.philosophyworks.org
results.name: School of Practical Philosophy

results.description: This group is for anyone interested in New York City real estate seeking to attend, or host, an OPEN HOUSE. We are a network of homeowners, realtors, renters and home buyers who want to create better neighborhoods throughout NYC by being better neighbors. The organizer of this meetup is not a licensed real estate agent, but a homeowner seeking connections via the old school word-of-mouth. Renting, buying, renovating, decorating and entertaining in own home and on our blocks should not be stressful, or leave us feeling isolated, but a FUN adventure! So let's connect, share resources and have a good time attending NYC stoop sales, indoor home bazaars, design events, BBQs, block parties, runs to the hardware store... anything to get our spaces all spruced up and ready for our OPEN HOUSE.
results.name: The Open House Meetup

results.description: HI, the whole purpose of this group is for people to network in the legal industry. People are to bring business cards with them and maybe talk about job opportunities. If there are not any job opportunities, form relationships with people, where they might know of someone who might be hiring. I am thinking of having a legal meet up group every two weeks.
results.name: New York Legal Networking Meetup

results.description: The Right Clique is NYC's premier networking club. What sets us apart from other networking groups is the amount of attention we give to our attendees. Our mission is to discover the person and passion behind each individual. We connect our networkers on rooftops, in high-level retail outlets, hotels, and restaurants. In a relaxed and friendly setting every six weeks or so, we gather to meet, greet, and have fun.
results.name: NYC's The Right Clique Business Networking Group

results.description: You know who you are, and the constant admiration from the public has become unique to this car. After running into the only other owner I've seen in the NYC area I've decided to see if there's anyone else out there. If you're like me you love this car and want the feeling it to last forever. I'm going to assume that if you own and can afford to maintain one of these beauties you'd be amiable to meeting other club members for a fine dining experience that's suitable for a numbered-edition Cadillac owner. I would insist on a place with out-front generous parking area where our pack of fine horses can be seen and admired while we dine in the deserving splendor that we've obviously earned. Someplace that would be convenient to all. I'm going to limit this club to 1596 members. If you have to ask...
results.name: 2002 Cadillac Eldorado Collector's Edition Club

results.description: This group is for anyone who is home with little ones (0-3 years) right now and looking for a playgroup and adult conversation! Let's get together once a week.
results.name: White Plains Stay-at-Home Moms

topics.name: Make New Friends, from all Walks of Life
Live Music Jam Sessions Concerts Festivals

results.description:
The Change You Seek... Could Be A Heartbeat Away~

Are you a 20/30-something trendsetter/revolutionary/free-spirit in hibernation/stagnation/quicksand/ your own bubble who has recently come to the very real conclusion that your current situation/path is not the most optimal or even remotely conducive to you reaching your full potential? Do you know for a fact that you have so much more to offer, so much more to learn and to see and so much more you'd like to accomplish -- especially if you could just find your niche, a place to belong and thrive?

Are you searching for something new, exciting, engaging, cutting-edge, definitely out of ordinary but... not too far-fetched? Looking for a group of $%#& AWESOME comrades from all different walks of life and wayyyy less boring Saturday nights?!? Could it be that... you live for lively intellectual conversations and thought-provoking literature, scrumptious eclectic dining, intriguing art, progressive and retro music, one of a kind fashion statements, juicy film discussions, candid photo-ops, open cultural exchange, hip scenes and suave soirees, global activism, bucket-list follies and jet-setting adventures?

This group will serve as a loving support group,  an awesome social and professional network and, of course, a best friend(s) for life and soulmate breeding ground... a second family. The first goal is to establish a core base, so the first meetups and intake of interested individuals will be centered around this. Once the foundation has been built, membership requirements and guidelines will be posted and observed. 








The HEARTBEATS a.k.a. THB/THb:  (NOUNS LIVING VERBS):A not-so-secret , yet semi-private society/group comprised of some of the world's most unique, compassionate, awe-inspiring, savvy, intelligent, revolutionary and fun individuals.

Why The HEARTBEATS? Because a Heartbeat is a reassuring reminder that there is still life to be lived, that time is still on your side; it's not too late. A Heartbeat's intrinsic rhythm gives life to the heart: it gives trillions of smiles, bouts of laughter, tears of joy and cherished memories to billions. A Heartbeat is essential: no one thrives in this world without one. Nothing is more basic, more complex, more profound, more fragile, more hopeful, more beautiful, more urgent, more relevant, more heart-felt...All living beings are carriers of heartbeats within their bodies, but only certain beings can truly embody what it means to be a HEARTBEAT... Do you have the HEART to be a HEARTBEAT?
results.name: The HEARTBEATS

We have different age groups and genres that will meet in a store that serves Ready-To-Eat Asian food, one of there largest selections of asian candies and snack in Monmouth County and a bubble tea bar that has over 144,000 possible flavor combinations. The purpose of this group is to meet, watch and share opinions and concepts in anime in a setting environment that compliments the groups interest. The store is open everyday from 9am-10pm and is available for other groups, meetups or just friends that want to get together.

All events are easy to moderate. We value friendship, fun and learning more than money there is no fee for joining, events except from third parties, but we accept donations

results.description:
This group is for ladies 22-32ish who are in or around the Boerum Hill/Cobble Hill/Carroll Gardens area of Brooklyn and are looking for a group of friends to hang out with. I want this to be a little community of friends in our neighborhood, which can be kind of tough to find. (Sidenote: I hate the BoCoCa abbrevation, but I needed a location-specific name, so we're stuck with it unless someone thinks of something better ;).)

This is going to be super laid back and casual, so if you're in the area and want a cool bunch of girls to grab drinks with, this might be for you. Meetups will mostly be at nearby bars/restaurants, events, apartments, etc., since our area is awesome.

I want to keep this pretty small and local, so that you guys have a chance to actually get to know each other. Most meetups won't be more than 10 people, so that everyone can actually talk to one another. Also, the name isn't meant to be limiting - ladies from surrounding neighborhoods are totally welcome!
results.name: BoCoCa Ladies (20s/early 30s)

results.description: Come join Joanne in a Healing within experience as she helps bring the community together to transform the mind, body and spirit of each person.<br>what you will experience in her meet up:<br>• Reiki Healing <br>• Visual Guided Meditation <br>• Aura Cleansing<br>• Journaling<br>• Peace<br>• Clarity<br>• Group Sharing<br>• Friendships <br>• Love<br>• Self- Love<br>• Growth<br>and more!<br>Reservation is requured! Please call 1-week prior to event to reserve your spot. <br>Some Meetups require a donation and some are complimentary events.<br>call 646.236.9155 to Reserve your spot. Namaste.
results.name: Healing Within: Group Meditation & Healing Circle

results.description: Hey Everyone. Hope you all doing well. I am here to promote a friendly gathering for everyone who is New to New York or Current Resident in NYC. Be positive, be open, and we can all share fun events together. Come check it out, and you are all welcome to invite all your friends =)
results.name: NYC Social Events/Singles/New Arrival/International

results.description: Hi Everyone, This group is for International Singles or New Arrival in NYC. Anyone can join and I host all the top events in the city. Everyone can join, share their experiences and cultures with each other. We can all make friends and go outside of meetup. So invite your friends and lets learn and explore together.  Come check us out. Just be open minded, and have fun. Life's short, Enjoy a little more smile =)

topics.name: Multiple Sclerosis and your Quality Of Life
Multiple Sclerosis and The Right Questions

results.description:
Every Healthy 365 is a group designed to create awareness of possible alternative long lasting healing methods for those suffering with :

: Multiple Sclerosis
: Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
: Parkinson's disease
 Chronic Renal Failure
: Diabetes Mellitus

Come join us in creating  open forum discussions on how we can restore Health and Happiness to those whom face  all sorts of challenges in their day to day lives afflicted by various auto-immune diseases that in most cases offer little options using some cutting edge treatments such as , clinical stem cell trials , holistic healing  and positive thinking meditative methods that will give you the ability to "take your power back" as they say in re-creating a life of  constant health and happiness.

results.description: This is the New York Book Club. We read about history, politics, and current events and don't give a hot damn for those who frown upon what we do or think otherwise. We have high-caliber weekly material and discuss it. However, we welcome everyone. There is no requirement to have done the reading to attend. All and every interested person is welcome to attend. Our weekly reading focuses the discussion. But after this one-hour discussion, anyone may comment. We are always looking for co-hosts. Let us know.
results.name: New York Book Club

results.description: This group is for dancers that are looking for a community to grow in as a family. Why should you take a new class or audition alone? I also started this group to find 4 girls or guys and a choreographer that can perform with me locally and within the tri-state area beginning in late September 2015. Lets build an encouraging community together where we can talk about our experiences and help each other reach our goals in a positive way!

results.description: The Brooklyn Paranormal Society was founded in 2015 by inexperienced investigators with a common vision of finding ghosts while inebriated. With the recent glamorization of ghost hunting by the media, many paranormal investigation groups have formed, simply for the thrill of the hunt. We are one of these groups, except we like to drink too.

results.description: It's just as it sounds! I simply miss the days of playing catch for hours on end, so why not get a group of like-minded individuals to meet in parks around the city and throw?
results.name: New York Throw A Baseball Meetup

results.description: In this group Dr.Mohsin will discuss why "Food is Medicine" is the truth and how it can help you regain your health . Dr. Mohsin, an internationally renowned practitioner, treats a wide array of illness ranging from cancer to common cold patients from 53 countries with over 20 years of experience defending why “Food is Medicine”. Dr. Mohsin has MPH from Colombia University, ND from Trinity College of Naturopathy with two Masters in other disciplines. For more details, please visit www.sandeepayurvedic.com

topics.name: Meetings other couples who share your interest too
Happy Couples meeting other happy couples

results.description: 50 is the new 30! Join us as we embrace this next phase of our lives. This group is for committed couples who love each other- and have a love of life. Join us as we venture into a wide variety of things that we can now afford to do and have the time to do, now that our kids are a bit older! Future meetups will include all sorts of adventures- from mild to wild- hiking, dining, travel, motorcycles, comedy clubs, horseback riding, white-water rafting...you name it! (with a heavy focus on weekend getaways, domestic and international travel). Suggestions are always welcome! (Please be in the 45-55 range- plus or minus a few! Please no singles or swingers, thanks!)
results.name: 50 is the New 30! Fun Couples with an Adventurous Side!

results.description: This group is for people in their 20s and 30s, in NYC, who enjoy happy hours, outdoor activities, clubs, dancing, dining, bars, dinner parties, and other local activities. This group is for single people, married people, people who are new in town, and people who are not so new in town. Membership is FREE, you simply need to be fun, friendly and open to join!
results.name: New York New In Town Meetup

results.description: This is a group for anyone interested in fun social activities. Such as hiking, rock climbing, dining out, house parties, music concert, DIY workshops, etc. All skills levels and interests are welcomed. I started this group because to meet other fun social active people. Looking forward to get together with everybody.
results.name: New York Fun Times Meetup

results.description: This is a group for anyone who loves to read, but singles especially. I am a hopeless bibliophile. I have spent a lifetime reading and my one regret when it comes time to punch the clock for good will be that I haven't read enough. I am a bit shy as well, but nothing makes getting to know someone easier that the right topic, some shared enthusiasm. I probably should say that this is a group for singles from 25 to 50, or something like that--but I am rather put off by snobbish exclusivity or ageism or whatever that's all about. What do I care if some old dude meets some old gal and they fall madly in love with each other? Is the problem that it is happening in the same room or that I don't have the social adroitness to actually speak to someone who remembers Margaret Thatcher? I want EVERYONE to come to my party. Let a thousand corks pop. Nonetheless, I will call this--drum roll--Singles Who Love (To Read). (Ain't I clever?)  Feel free to suggest books and to use the discussion board to start the conversation right off.  At least post something there about yourself, your most embarrassing moment, that old felony charge--you know, something juicy.  By the way, would a veteran meetup-er check out this site and let me know if is fully rule-compliant?  It would be greatly appreciated.
results.name: Singles Who Love (To Read): Biblophiles of New York

topics.name: Separation & Divorce Support for Men and Women

results.description: safe & supportive arena for surviving separation struggles.
results.name: Town of Huntington Divorce Support Group

results.description:
Calling all serious and dedicated quadcopter/multirotor FPV racers. Looking to fly courses, hold races, exchange build information, practice together and push limits.

This is an FPV proximity / race course piloting community.  Emphasis on speed, clean builds, and 3D parts design.   Primary formats are 250/180/120.

Our very active day to day conversations are in a slack channel.  Join this meetup to get an invitation.  

We fly in Union, Hudson, Middlesex, Somerset and Montgomery Counties several times a week.  Join our a very active and supportive group!
results.name: Safety Third FPV Multirotor Racing - Team S3

topics.name: Single Moms of Parentally Alienated Children
Raising a Child as a Single Mother

results.description: Being a single mom is like juggling with one hand. But we are doing it successfully. Yet, I think it helps if we have a break sometimes. Maybe someone to listen. Maybe just to forget for a moment. Whatever your reason, come on in. Just know. You are not alone.
results.name: NY Single Moms of Teens & Young Adults
results.who: Single Moms of Teens & Yg Adults

results.description: Calling all dietitians, nutritionists and food professionals. Let's come together and share stories about our career, and discuss hot topics in our field. Having a platform for us to meet and network could shed light on new opportunities to take part in the NY metro area. Let's make this fun as well as informative. The FANN club will include eating and drinking because after all, that's what we'll be talking about!
results.name: Food & Nutrition Networking Club (FANN Club)

results.description: This group is for small business entrepreneurs of all types; it's about connecting LOCALLY independently-owned businesses with customers, resources and each other. We are the ONLY business alliance in the Newark area focused on SMALL businesses. Promoting, connecting, advising, advocating on YOUR behalf for greater visibility... OUR FOCUS is LOCALISM and driving $$$ and sustainability to your business. We have a signature event called the ReMIXX every month where we feature an entrepreneur. NOW we'd like to meet to determine how we can better address the opportunities and challenges of the local change maker in a more intimate setting Our Goals 1. Create a strong member network for local innovators, equip them with the resources they need to prosper, create jobs, and function in harmony with local ecosystems. 2. Keep Dollars in the Local Economy/Reduce Capital Leakage – for every $100 spent at a locally-owned business, $73 remains in the local economy, compared to that of a non-locally owned business which only retains $43. We know that entrepreneurship fuels economic innovation and prosperity, and serves as a key means for families to move out of low wage jobs and into the middle class. 3. Increase small business visibility and foster Economic Inclusion; locally owned businesses build strong communities. By sustaining vibrant communities, linking neighbors via economic and social relationships, leading to strong healthy engaged communities. Now is the time to join forces to protect, foster, and strengthen the local businesses in our neighborhoods that give us a sense of place, ensure our diverse culture, and provide us with strong unique communities we are proud to call home
results.name: Newark Forward Ever Business Alliance Meetup

Often times the most successful people have one important quality, charisma. This group is about learning the secret behind Charismatic Communication. I look forward to meeting you!

results.description: If you’ve lived in New York you’ve probably heard of a speakeasy. The word denotes mystery, secrets, fun, and adventure. Speakeasy Brands NYC is a group dedicated to giving you a sneak peek of what goes on behind the scenes at new brands headquartered in the New York City area. We allow you to build direct connections with a community of hardworking innovators that show and tell their story, brand and product before it officially hits the market. You also gain exclusive access to relaxed venues where you can continue to expand your professional network over a drink of your choice.

results.description: This group is for those that love Hair. All types. If your a cosmetology student, recent graduate, licensed professional or just talented this group is for you. Wether it be for get together and a chitchat , makeovers & uplifting, visiting seniors and giving them a day beauty. I encourage anyone to contribute to any ideas. Don't be shy let's chat
